title: Tales of Yu Pavilion - Novel Updates
genre: Drama   Fantasy   Historical   Horror   Mystery   Supernatural   Tragedy
author: Ke Shui Yu You Zou   瞌睡鱼游走
description:
Welcome to Yu Pavilion
The Strangely and Prudential of Devil Tavern

Drinking Wine, Tell the Story of Kindness and Bitterness
Between Human and Inhuman

Listening to the Tales of the Parallel World
Saw the Darkness of Human
And the Brightness of Demon

Run into the Wonderful Adventure
And the Legend of Love>
